review: This is a really neat little device.  The only issue I have is I sit about 20 feet away from big screen TV.  This works pretty good from smart phone.  I haven't had it on enough to get laptop to make it work yet.  The range is 20 feet so it's a little finicky to start each time.  But to watch Netflix you don't have to have a play station or x box.  Pretty cool for a 60 yr old to make it work too.
